ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT(Contains($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), INCLUDES(Content_Management_Solution_CMS__c , "Other"), ISBLANK(Content_Management_Solution__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "Other" is selected in 'Content Management Solution' field, please specify the software that is being used in the 'CMS Other' field.
